high_descs: turn to the right and take a step and turn to the right and take a step and turn to the left and go to the wall and turn to the right and go to the desk
pick up the glass bowl from the desk
turn to the right twice and take a few steps and turn to the left and go to the nightstand
turn on the light on the nightstand
anns.task_desc: Examine a glass bowl by the light of a nightstand lamp

high_descs: Turn to the right and then turn right again to find the desk in the corner of the room.
Pick up the bowl from the back of the desk.
Carry the bowl and turn around. Then turn left and find the small dresser and lamp.
Hold the bowl and turn on the lamp.
anns.task_desc: Hold a bowl and turn on the lamp.

high_descs: Turn right then take a step to your right then walk to the wall then turn right and walk to the desk.
Pick up the clear bowl that's in front of you.
Turnaround and take a step then turn left and walk to the light that's on the night stand.
Turn on the light that's on the night stand.
anns.task_desc: Inspect a bowl by lamp light.
